p: Signalments, concurrent diseases, clinical disease at the time of hospitalization and during each consecutive day, treatment prior to and during hospitalization, days of hospitalization/euthanasia and laboratory results were registered for each patient. Clinical disease was scored according to the AHDS‐scoring system from 0‐18 and the number of SIRS criteria (tachycardia (HR > 120), tachypnea (RR > 40), hyper or hypothermia (T > 39.0°C or < 37.5°C), leucocytosis (WBC > 18*10 9/L), leukopenia (WBC < 5*10 9/L, band neutrophilia and/or hypoglycaemia [glucose <4 mmol/L]) were recorded.
